contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox person |name = Doreen Mantle |birth_date = 1930 (age 82) |birth_place =[[South Africa]] |occupation=[[Actress]] |yearsactive=1967–present }} '''Doreen Mantle''' (born 1930) is a [[South Africa]]n-born [[United Kingdom|British]] actress who is probably best known for her role as Mrs Jean Warboys in ''[[One Foot in the Grave]]'' (1990–2000). She has appeared in many [[United Kingdom|British]] television series from the 1960s to the present, such as ''[[The Duchess of Duke Street]]'', ''[[The Wild House]]'', ''[[Chalk (TV series)|Chalk]]'', ''[[Casualty (TV series)|Casualty]]'', ''[[The Bill]]'', ''[[Doctors (soap opera)|Doctors]]'', ''[[Holby City]]'' and ''[[Jonathan Creek]]''. She played lollipop lady Queenie in ''[[Jam & Jerusalem]]'' (2006–2009). Mantle has worked extensively on the stage in such productions as ''[[My Fair Lady]]'', ''Keep It in the Family'', ''[[The Seagull]]'' and ''[[Hamlet]]''. She also toured Britain in ''[[Billy Liar]]'' in the role of Florence Boothroyd and performed at the [[Royal National Theatre|National Theatre]] in ''[[The Voysey Inheritance]]''. She has done a lot of work on radio for [[BBC Radio 3]], [[BBC Radio 4]] and [[BBC World Service]]. She starred as Mrs Shaemen in the 1983 movie ''[[Yentl (film)|Yentl]]'' alongside Barbra Streisand In October 2010, it was announced that Mantle is to join ''[[Coronation Street]]'' as the mother of past character [[List of minor Coronation Street characters (2010)#Colin Fishwick|Colin Fishwick]]. Fishwick was the person whose identity was taken by [[John Stape]].<ref>http://www.digitalspy.co.uk/soaps/s3/coronation-street/news/a284448/one-foot-in-the-grave-star-joins-corrie.html</ref> She also had a part in an episode of My Family during series ten in 2010. ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *{{imdb name|id=0544140|name=Doreen Mantle}} {{OlivierAward PlayActress SupportingPerformance 1976–2000}} {{Authority control|VIAF=222464486}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Mantle, Doreen | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 1930 | PLACE OF BIRTH =[[South Africa]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Mantle, Doreen}} [[Category:1930 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:South African television actresses]] [[Category:British television actresses]] {{SouthAfrica-actor-stub}} {{UK-tv-actor-stub}}
